summary: This mod add trees and vegetations inside the city of Solitude. The differences can also be seen from Tamriel.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][color=#38761D]A F[color=#6aa84f]ores[color=#38761D]t In S[/color]olit[/color]ude

[/color][size=6][size=6][color=#38761D][img width=668,height=382]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84506-0-1497019878.png[/img][/color][/size][/size][color=#38761D]
[youtube]2JTd0WCYtGQ[/youtube]
[color=#ffffff]
[size=4]Descriptions : This mod is following to my mod A Forest in Whiterun but adapted to the city of Solitude. Green tree, grass and flowers are now part of the environment.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color][/color][size=4]
Performance : I am only using components from skyrim so you shouldn't lose any framerate.
[size=6][color=#38761D][color=#ffffff][size=4]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color][/color][/size]
Other : Don't forget to download A Forest In Whiterun if you want more vegetations in the city.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83341/?
[/size][size=6][color=#38761D][color=#ffffff][size=4]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color][/color][/size][/center][/size]
author: Blacksteur83
